Constant Field Values

MAX_NUMBER_OF_SIMULTANEOUS_CAPTCHAS_PROP

public static final java.lang.String MAX_NUMBER_OF_SIMULTANEOUS_CAPTCHAS_PROP
The name of the key under which the initial value of the maxNumberOfSimultaneousCaptchas attribute is defined in the service initialization file. This is mandatory parameter in the service initialization file.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MIN_GUARANTED_STORAGE_DELAY_IN_SECONDS_PROP

public static final java.lang.String MIN_GUARANTED_STORAGE_DELAY_IN_SECONDS_PROP
The name of the key under which the initial value of the minGuarantedStorageDelayInSeconds is defined in the service intialization file. This is a mandatory parameter in the service initialization file.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ENGINE_CLASS_INIT_PARAMETER_PROP

public static final java.lang.String ENGINE_CLASS_INIT_PARAMETER_PROP
The name of the key under which the ImageCaptchaEngine implementation class name initialy used by the service is defined in the service initialization file. This is a mandatory parameter in the service initialization file.

See Also:

Method Detail

generateCaptchaAndRenderChallengeAsJpeg

public byte[] generateCaptchaAndRenderChallengeAsJpeg(java.lang.String theCaptchaID)
                                               throws ImageCaptchaServiceException
Generate a new ImageCaptcha and render it as a jpeg image

Parameters:
theCaptchaID - a unique ID to store the generated captcha under.
Returns:
a jpeg image as an array of bytes (this is image is the generated captcha challenge)
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if theCaptchaID is null or too long.
ImageCaptchaServiceException - in case of error. Possible error details are :
  • ImageCaptchaServiceException.TOO_MANY_USERS_ERROR
See Also:
ImageCaptchaServiceException.TOO_MANY_USERS_ERROR

verifyResponseToACaptchaChallenge

public boolean verifyResponseToACaptchaChallenge(java.lang.String theCaptchaID,
                                                 java.lang.String theResponse)
                                          throws ImageCaptchaServiceException
Verify client response to the challenge of a captcha previously generated by the generateCaptchaAndRenderChallengeAsJpeg method. This method causes the captcha associated with the ID to be removed from the internal store (so this method can only called one time for a particular captcha).

Parameters:
theCaptchaID - the unique ID previously provided to the generateCaptchaAndRenderChallengeAsJpeg method. This is the unique ID the previously generated captcha is associated with.
theResponse - the client response to the captcha challenge
Returns:
true is the response to the challenge is correct, false otherwise.
Throws:
ImageCaptchaServiceException - in case of error. Possible error details are :
  • ImageCaptchaServiceException.NO_CAPTCHA_WITH_THIS_ID_ERROR
See Also:
ImageCaptchaServiceException.NO_CAPTCHA_WITH_THIS_ID_ERROR

getCaptchaIDMaxLength

public int getCaptchaIDMaxLength()
Get the maximum length allowed by the service for a captcha ID

Returns:
the maximum length allowed by the service for a captcha ID

setCaptchaIDMaxLength

public void setCaptchaIDMaxLength(int theCaptchaIDMaxLength)
Set the maximum length allowed by the service for a captcha ID

Parameters:
theCaptchaIDMaxLength - the maximum length allowed by the service for a captcha ID

registerToMBeanServer

public void registerToMBeanServer(java.lang.String theRegisteringName)
                           throws ImageCaptchaServiceException
Register self to the first MBean server available in the JVM, if any.

Parameters:
theRegisteringName - the name the service will be registered to the MBean server.
Throws:
ImageCaptchaServiceException - in case of error. Possible error details are :
  • ImageCaptchaServiceException.MALFORMED_REGISTERING_NAME
  • ImageCaptchaServiceException.INSTANCE_ALREADY_REGISTERED
See Also:
ImageCaptchaServiceException.MALFORMED_REGISTERING_NAME, ImageCaptchaServiceException.INSTANCE_ALREADY_REGISTERED

unregisterFromMBeanServer

public void unregisterFromMBeanServer()
Unregister self from the first MBean server available in the JVM, if any

public void setImageCaptchaEngineClass(java.lang.String theClassName)
                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Description copied from interface: ImageCaptchaServiceMBean
Set the fully qualified class name of the concrete ImageCaptchaEngine used by the service

Specified by:
setImageCaptchaEngineClass in interface ImageCaptchaServiceMBean
Parameters:
theClassName - the fully qualified class name of the ImageCaptchaEngine used by the service
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if className can't be used as the service ImageCaptchaEngine, either because it can't be instanciated by the service or it is not a ImageCaptchaEngine concrete class.

ImageCaptchaServiceMBean.setImageCaptchaEngineClass(java.lang.String)
